item.description:
Girl's Only!

Grab some friends and get ready to learn how to bring out your inner Bedroom Badgirl!

Space is limited. Pre-payment only, please.

``Honey, they don`t call it a job for nothing.``
-Samantha Jones, Sex and The City

Have truer words ever been spoken?

No doubt you already have a spicy repertoire of techniques?.but do you actually love doing it? You can know all sorts of tricks and tips?but if you don`t love doing it, then what`s the point?


Our Sex Ed Salons have one main goal.

Help every woman who attends identify her own needs and communicate them to her partner. That`s what sexual confidence is all about. We don`t teach you how to make it all about him. Our vision is to help women make it a powerful and sensual experience for both you and your man.

Do you have a specific concern? Our instructors are professional educators in the field of Human Sexuality. Throw them any question and they`ll probably have more than one answer or suggestion.

$20 - Pay Here: http://moxieprivatepa...

NEW DATING BLOG POSTS!

She Doesn't Want to Be 45 & Single
READ THE POST & COMMENT http://moxieblog.type...


Bachelorette, Birthday, Team Building & Girls Night Out Events, Too! http://www.moxieinthe...


ASK YOUR OWN DATING/SEX RELATED QUESTION - GET FEEDBACK FROM DOZENS OF PEOPEL ACROSS THE COUNTRY - FREE AND ANONYMOUS!
http://www.moxieinthe...
